description: You have 20 units of labor to initiate a bridge construction. You can allocate some/all units to a partner’s segment, known for better engineering skills, to potentially double the effectiveness of labor (e.g., 1 unit → 2 units of progress). Your partner will decide how much progress benefit they will share back with you.

behavior_choices.trust_high: Allocate all 20 units to partner’s segment.
